comment: I highly recommend her, she is a life saver. She is always willing to help and replies to emails in a timely manner.

I am terrible at coding but she is seriously the best. TAKE HER IF YOU CAN!! Always willing to check your work through email before you turn it in. Made 100s on everything and at least a 96 on every exam. THE BEST!!

I had her for IT 1113 and we basically had a few quizzes and mainly the projects were the heavy grade bearers. They were easy though if you payed attention in class and understood the concepts. She wasnt too hard on the deadlines as long as you followed the rubric and did what you had to do. I got an A in the class.

Very kind professor, responds to emails in a timely manner, and is willing to help you with any issues you have on the work in this class. Theres 3 Assignments, 2 milestones ( projects) and a research paper. The Assignments and milestones are easy to do so if you do good on those the research paper is not that much of an issue. Take her
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: Previously coming from a bad experience with another professor at KSU regarding python, you will find this professor to be your life saver and she is by far one of the best professors I've had at KSU. She is always willing to help with any questions you have, even if with labs and tests. Tests and labs are take home and open book. Good luck!
